title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.15 - System clock
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.15 - System clock

State Regulations
A MCS shall maintain an internal clock that reflects the
current time and date that shall be used to provide for the following: (a) time stamping of significant
events; (b) reference clock for
reporting; and
(c) time stamping of
configuration changes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.15

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
